vehicles.description: A white delivery vehicle parked on the side of the road, partially obstructing the right lane. The vehicle is adorned with yellow and orange branding and is larger than a standard car, indicating it may be difficult to maneuver around.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle may obstruct the ego car's path, requiring the ego car to change lanes or slow down to ensure a safe distance while passing.

vehicles.description: A dark grey sedan ahead, positioned in the center lane of a multi-lane road, facing the same direction as the ego car.
vehicles.explanation: The sedan represents normal flowing traffic, which the ego car will follow or pass depending on the speed and trajectory of both vehicles.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic scene observed, there is a white delivery vehicle parked on the side of the road, partially obstructing the right lane. It has yellow and orange branding and appears larger than an average car, which suggests it might be challenging to navigate around. This parked vehicle could be an obstruction for the ego car and thus might necessitate either a lane change or a reduction in speed to maintain a safe following distance.

Furthermore, there is a dark grey sedan traveling in the same direction as the ego car, located in the center lane of the multi-lane road. This sedan is part of the ongoing traffic and will influence the ego car's decision to either continue following at a steady pace or overtake, depending on the relative speeds and desired trajectory of the ego car.

There is no mention of vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, barriers, or other objects in the scene, which implies that such elements do not need to be considered in the driving decisions in this particular situation.

1.description and explanation: A tricycle is visible, typically used for delivery or transport of goods. The tricycle appears to be carrying a large load, which may affect its stability and maneuverability. As a result, the ego car should maintain a safe following distance and be prepared for unexpected movements or stopping of the tricycle. Passing the tricycle should be done with caution, ensuring there's enough space and visibility to do so safely.

driving_suggestion: Given the current scenario, the ego car should prepare to either slow down and follow the grey sedan at a safe distance, monitoring the distance to the parked delivery vehicle on the right. If it is safe and legal to do so, the ego car may change lanes to the left to avoid being impeded by the delivery vehicle, ensuring not to cut off other vehicles while maneuvering.
